entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 late this evening then light after midnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 04 February 2023
